roleset.name: to dismiss derisively
roleset.note: SCOFF-V NOTES: Member of Vncls nonverbal_expression-40.2. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from scoff.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Carl Schramm , president of the Health Insurance Association of America , scoffs at `` capitalists who want to socialize the entire financing system '' for health .
example.arg: Carl Schramm , president of the Health Insurance Association of America ,
at capitalists who want to socialize the entire financing system '' for health
